channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Structure Fire; INC#0856; 02:45PM; 13742 W Oscar St; MAP: https://bit.ly/45f2u2m; Sylmar; Heavy fire engulfing the home and spreading into the attic combined with the high heat in the Valley today resulted in an extended operation to achieve full extinguishment. Firefighter's aggressive actions defending the two adjacent (very closely situated) homes prevented them from sustaining any damage. The fire extension was limited to the shed/garage to the rear of the original fire property. Intense operations under the existing weather conditions took their toll and a total of 19 firefighters were evaluated by the LAFD Advanced Provider unit for heat exhaustion with one firefighter transported in fair (stable) condition. The cause of the fire is being investigated by the Incident Commander (LAFD Arson is not attached). No further details. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0981; 02:25PM; 13843 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/47fazpN; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN: The fire arriving fire companies extinguished the fire in 17 minutes. Firefighters prevented the fire from extended beyond the unit of origin. One patient reported to have burn injuries, the extent of which are unknown at this time (age/gender/condition unk). LAFD Arson attached to the unit per protocol for burn injury. No further details.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 CM40 CM42 E102 E288 E289 E81 E90 EM17 RA88 RA881 RA89 RM2 T88 T89; CH9; 12 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0981; 02:08PM; 13843 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/47fazpN; Van Nuys; Two story, garden style apartment building with fire in one unit on the 1st floor. Additional task force was added. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 CM40 CM42 E102 E288 E289 E81 E90 EM17 RA88 RA881 RA89 RM2 T88 T89; CH9; 12 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0856; 01:28PM; 13742 W Oscar St; MAP: https://bit.ly/45f2u2m; Sylmar; KNOCKDOWN: 68 firefighters battled heavy fire and excessive storage conditions for 42 minutes to achieve knockdown. The primary and secondary search of the residence found no patients. The fire involved the home, patio (excessive storage) and detached garage. One firefighter is being transported with a heat related illness. No other injuries reported. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E260 E27 E275 E287 E288 E298 E60 E7 E77 E91 E98 EA1 EM15 EM5 HR3 RA75 RA91 RA98 T60 T75 T87 T88 T98 UR27 UR88; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0856; 01:06PM; 13742 W Oscar St; MAP: https://bit.ly/45f2u2m; Sylmar; Excessive storage outside of the home and heavy fire throughout the structure, including the attic, is extending to a garage at the rear. The two homes adjacent to the fire structure remain exposed and firefighters are working to defend them while making good progress on the fire in the main home. Additional resources are enroute.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 CM40 CM42 E275 E287 E298 E7 E77 E91 E98 EM15 RA75 RA91 T75 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0856; 12:46PM; 13742 W Oscar St; MAP: https://bit.ly/45f2u2m; Sylmar; One story, single family dwelling with heavy fire showing and two other buildings possibly exposed. One additional task force requested.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E77 E91 E98 RA75 RA91 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Vehicle Into Building; INC#0742; 11:46AM; 5000 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YhaIVH; South Park; Vehicle into front of an apartment building. There are no reported injuries in the building. The driver of the vehicle is not trapped and does not appear to have sustained any life-threatening injuries. LAFD Heavy Rescue is evaluating the building for any structural issues (does not appear to be any at first examination). LA Dept of Building & Safety are responding for their expertise. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 2016 ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E14 E15 E215 E233 E33 E66 EM11 HR3 RA15 RA66 T15 T33; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0191; 05:21AM; 16419 W Nordhoff St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OEYJgn; #NorthHills; The fire was well-developed in the attic. A broken gas line was fueling the fire, and the gas company responded to shut off the main. Excessive storage inside presented challenges in accessing the fire, and limited the number of personnel that fit inside the structure. Overall, it took 38 firefighters 82 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E287 E290 E7 E75 E87 E90 RA87 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0191; 03:59AM; 16419 W Nordhoff St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OEYJgn; #NorthHills; One-story single-family home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E287 E290 E7 E75 E87 E90 RA87 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Airport Emergency; INC#0647; 12:34PM; 16303 W Waterman Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OEPKg1; #VanNuys; There will be a Unified Press Conference at 1:00pm at Van Nuys Airport. Media Staging will be at the Public Observation Site, 16303 W Waterman Dr.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 CR114 E103 E239 E290 E81 EM17 F114 PI1 PI2 RA81 RA88 T39 T90; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
